HTMLLabelElementControl.summary:
The read-only HTMLLabelElement.control property returns a
reference to the control (in the form of an object of type or
one of its derivatives) with which the label element is associated,
or null if the label isn't associated with a control.
HTMLLabelElementControl.value:
An derived object representing the control with which the
label is associated, or null if the label stands alone.
NOTENote: If this property has a value and has a value,
the property must refer to the same control.
